sentences.en: "Will it happen again?"— 'I hope not. but you never know.'
sentences.cn: “这事还会再发生吗？”——“但愿不会，但谁知道呢。”

sentences.en: A draw seems the best they can hope for.
sentences.cn: 看来他们顶多只能指望打个平局了。

sentences.en: Fraulein Wendel is well, I hope?
sentences.cn: 我想文德尔小姐一切都好吧？

sentences.en: He's been nourishing the hope of a trip abroad.
sentences.cn: 他一直怀着出国旅行的愿望.

sentences.en: I always knew it was too much to hope for.
sentences.cn: 我一直都知道这是个奢望。

sentences.en: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.cn: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.en: I do hope you'll forgive me but I've got to leave.
sentences.cn: 我真的非常抱歉，我得走了。

sentences.en: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.cn: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.en: I hope you enjoy your holiday. Go well!
sentences.cn: 祝你假期玩得愉快。再见！

sentences.en: I hope you're well.
sentences.cn: 我祝你身体健康。

sentences.en: I just live in hope that one day she'll talk to me.
sentences.cn: 我只是妄想着有一天她会和我说话。

sentences.en: I never dreamed that I'd tee up with Bob Hope.
sentences.cn: 我做梦也没想到能和鲍勃·霍普一起打高尔夫。

sentences.en: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.cn: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.en: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.cn: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.en: Only by being him can you hope to outguess him.
sentences.cn: 只有化作他肚子里的蛔虫才有可能猜出他在想什么。

sentences.en: That really knocked back any hope for further peace negotiations.
sentences.cn: 那的确一度使进一步的和平谈判成为泡影。

sentences.en: The car was smashed beyond any hope of repair.
sentences.cn: 汽车被撞烂了，修复无望。

sentences.en: Things aren't ideal, but that's the best you can hope for.
sentences.cn: 事情并不理想，但你只能指望这样了。

sentences.en: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.cn: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

sentences.en: You're not trying to see him, I hope?
sentences.cn: 但愿你不是想要去见他吧？

sentences.en: 中文例句：When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.cn: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

words.tran_cn: 绝望地；无望地；无可救药地

phrases.tran_cn: 鲍勃·霍普（美国喜剧演员）
n. 敢死队；孤注一掷的
一线希望：几乎没有理由地期待
希望钻石；希望之钻；希望之星（重达45.2克拉，且全球最大的蓝宝石）

phrases.phrase: hope springs eternal in the human breast

phrases.tran_cn: 最后的希望或被寄托最后希望的人

trans.tran_cn: 希望，被寄予希望的人/事物
trans.tran_en: a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely
to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
